prototypes.prototype: progressBarShow(id, width, height, pct, barcolor, msg)

description.p: The name of a placeholder, or id of an HTML element. If an id of an element, prefix the id with element e.g. *[js:element:div1]*.
Width of the progress bar. Must be a valid CSS size value for [width].
Default = "5px". Height of the progress bar. Must be a valid CSS size value for [height].
Default = 0. The percentage complete. Specify a value of 0 to display an empty progress bar and 100 to display a full progress bar.
The color of the progress bar. Color must be a [CSS color value].
A message to display to the right of the progress bar.

discussion.p: The *[js:progressBarShow()]* method creates and displays a simple progress bar in an [Placeholder control] or HTML element.

description.p: The size, progress shown, progress color, and optional progress message can be specified when creating the progress bar. For example:
